name: IFICI regime with high income (€60,000)
description: Qualified professional under IFICI regime demonstrating significant tax savings at higher income levels

sources.description: IFICI regime provides 20% flat tax rate - significant savings vs standard progressive rates
sources.notes: IFICI flat rate: IRS=60000*0.20=12000; SS: 6600; Net: 41400. Standard regime net: €34,734.43. IFICI benefit: €6,665.57 (19% more take-home pay). The benefit increases significantly at higher incomes due to avoiding progressive rates up to 48%.
